definitions.definition: the action or process of investing money for profit or material result.
examples: a debate over private investment in road-building
synonyms: underwriting; buying shares "some tips for responsible investment"stake

definitions.definition: a thing that is worth buying because it may be profitable or useful in the future.
examples: a used car is rarely a good investment

definitions.definition: an act of devoting time, effort, or energy to a particular undertaking with the expectation of a worthwhile result.
examples: the time spent in attending a one-day seminar is an investment in our professional futures

definitions.definition: the surrounding of a place by a hostile force in order to besiege or blockade it.
